stories.text:
My friend from Slovenia is having trouble with discord. It eats his messages.

I can't load photos from my friend in telegram and the messages take a relatively long time - multiple seconds! - to get received.

TrackMania players have talked about having input lag.

Some sites I've found via google results seem to report that they are suffering from slow connections.

Do you have anything?
stories.title: Tell HN: Facebook is down and things run slower
Fifty Years Ago, the First CT Scan Let Doctors See Inside a Living Skull
Intel's 12th Gen Alder Lake K-Series CPUs Arrive at Amazon Overseas

stories.text: Hacker News seems incredibly slow today. Timeouts or multisecond responses. Y'all okay?
stories.title: Hacker News slow today [04 Oct 2021]
Russia test fires submarine-launched hypersonic Tsirkon missile for first time

stories.text: Hacker News (this site) seems to be going down today just like facebook. Is there a massive DDOS attack occurring or just a co-incidence?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is HN having problem keeping up today?
Humble Book Bundle: Infrastructure and Ops by O'Reilly (Pay Wh
DNS A and AAA records for Facebook, Instagram and WhatsApp have been destroyed
Ask HN: Why is HN's website so slow today?
